directions: Mix tahini, lemon juice, and salt in a bowl until smooth and well incorporated. Stir in warm water, 1 tablespoon at a time, to achieve a drizzling consistency. Adjust dressing with more salt or lemon juice as desired.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons lemon juice, or more to taste
¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste
2 tablespoons warm water, or as needed
title: Vegan Tahini Dressing
